author.desc: Displays the author and year in the format in which it is to be used in conjunction with the canonical name. eg: (Pallas, 1811)
author.title: Author and Year

canonical.desc: Displays the canonical name ie. the full name without author and year.
canonical.title: Canonical

id.desc: The ID number of the name on the match database.
id.title: ID

name.desc: Displays the verbatim name ie. the full name with author and year if known.
name.title: Name

position.desc: Displays the list in which the name is currently present.
position.title: Position

rank.desc: Displays the taxonomic rank of the name within its IBP hierarchy.
rank.title: Rank

source.desc: Displays the last database against which the name was resolved. If no database name is provided this could be author curated.
source.title: Source

status.desc: Displays the current nomenclatural status of the name as recognised on Portal.
status.title: Status

via.desc: Displays the original source from which the data was sourced into the match database.
via.title: via
